question: Who has been appointed as the new chairman of National Stock Exchange?
explanation: Leading stock exchange NSE on December 6,2019Â  appointed Public Interest Director Girish Chandra Chaturvedi as its new chairman. The appointment comes following the approval of the markets regulator Securities and Exchange Board of India (Sebi). The position was vacant since Ashok Chawla resigned as the chairman of the National Stock Exchange (NSE) in January 2019.
